TopicTitle: Kerbals mentioned in Popular Mechanics video

Articles.Content:
This is pretty funny. It's a video about making an interstellar voyage possible.

http://www.popularmechanics.com/space/a17986/a-video-primer-to-getting-to-interstellar-travel-in-a-generation-or-two/
It's at 1:22 for those who are looking for it.
Regular mechanics wear collars. Popular mechanics have no need for them.
PBS Space Time mentions KSP in two episodes. I can tell you this because I watched them all. Today.
I noticed they spelled it as "Curbles" in the closed captions. Someone doesn't play KSP...

Regular mechanics wear collars. Popular mechanics have no need for them.

What's the difference between an auto mechanic, and a quantum mechanic? The Quantum Mechanic can get his car out of the garage without opening the door first.
